channel.title: SMF 74 Subtype 5 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 74 Subtype 5 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: Field - _1l
item.description: Length of RAID rank data section Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF7451L Description Length of RAID rank data section

item.title: Field - _1n
item.description: Number of RAID rank data sections Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF7451N Description Number of RAID rank data sections

item.title: Field - _1o
item.description: Offset to RAID rank data section Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF7451O Description Offset to RAID rank data section

item.title: Field - altvm
item.description: Running under an alternate virtual machine environment Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description Running under an alternate virtual machine environment Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field fla.

item.title: Field - bfy
item.description: SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Record: SMF74S5 Based on: flg Description SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field flg.

item.title: Field - boost_class
item.description: Boost class is set at end of interval, valid only when zIIP boost and/or Speed boost is active: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description Boost class is set at end of interval, valid only when zIIP boost and/or Speed boost is active: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process Post-Processed Flags postprocessor for multiple bit mapping.

item.title: Field - cl
item.description: Length of control section Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF745CL Description Length of control section

item.title: Field - cn
item.description: Number of control sections Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF745CN Description Number of control sections

item.title: Field - cne
item.description: Equipped with ESCON channel Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Description Equipped with ESCON channel Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field prf.

item.title: Field - cnv
item.description: Data converted from version 2 Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description Data converted from version 2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field fla.

item.title: Field - co
item.description: Offset to control section Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF745CO Description Offset to control section

item.title: Field - cyc
item.description: Sampling cycle length Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74CYC Description Sampling cycle length

item.title: Field - dat
item.description: Date monitor interval start Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74DAT Description Date monitor interval start

item.title: Field - date
item.description: Date of Record Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF74DTE

item.title: Field - dl
item.description: Length of CACHE device data section Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF745DL Description Length of CACHE device data section

item.title: Field - dn
item.description: Number of CACHE device data sections Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF745DN Description Number of CACHE device data sections

item.title: Field - do
item.description: Offset to CACHE device data section Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF745DO Description Offset to CACHE device data section

item.title: Field - drc
item.description: ESCON Director in configuration Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Description ESCON Director in configuration Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field prf.

item.title: Field - dte
item.description: DATE RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF74DTE Description DATE RECORD WRITTEN

item.title: Field - eed
item.description: Speed boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description Speed boost was active during entire interval Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 10 of field fla.

item.title: Field - eme
item.description: System in z/ARCH mode Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Description System in z/ARCH mode Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field prf.

item.title: Field - esa
item.description: MVS/ESA IF ON Record: SMF74S5 Based on: flg Description MVS/ESA IF ON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field flg.

item.title: Field - fla
item.description: Flags Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74FLA Description Flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description cnv 0 Data converted from version 2 iss 1 Invalid samples to be skipped m3r 2 Record was written by RMF Monitor III ism 3 Interval was under SMF control rcl 4 SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR.

item.title: Field - flg
item.description: SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF74FLG Description SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description rrf 0 NEW RECORD FORMAT sut 1 SUBTYPES USED v4 3 MVS/ESA V4 IF ON esa 4 MVS/ESA IF ON vxa 5 MVS/XA IF ON os 6 OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 bfy 7 SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE

item.title: Field - gie
item.description: Projected gathering interval end GMT time Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74GIE Description Projected gathering interval end GMT time

item.title: Field - iet
item.description: Interval expiration time token Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74IET Description Interval expiration time token

item.title: Field - iip
item.description: zIIP boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description zIIP boost was active during entire interval Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 9 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iml
item.description: Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. X'03’ = 9672, zSeries Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74IML Description Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. X'03’ = 9672, zSeries

item.title: Field - int
item.description: Duration of monitor interval Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74INT Description Duration of monitor interval

item.title: Field - ism
item.description: Interval was under SMF control Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description Interval was under SMF control Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iss
item.description: Invalid samples to be skipped Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description Invalid samples to be skipped Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ist
item.description: Time monitor interval start Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74IST Description Time monitor interval start

item.title: Field - len
item.description: SMF RECORD LENGTH. ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF74LEN Description SMF RECORD LENGTH. ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY

item.title: Field - lgo
item.description: Offset GMT to local time Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74LGO Description Offset GMT to local time

item.title: Field - m3r
item.description: Record was written by RMF Monitor III Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description Record was written by RMF Monitor III Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field fla.

item.title: Field - mfv
item.description: RMF version number Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74MFV Description RMF version number

item.title: Field - mvs
item.description: MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm) Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74MVS Description MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm)

item.title: Field - nedmanuf
item.description: Manufacturer Map: R745CNTL Based on: NEDMANUF Description Manufacturer

item.title: Field - nedmodn
item.description: Model number Map: R745CNTL Based on: NEDMODN Description Model number

item.title: Field - nedpmanu
item.description: Plant of manufacture Map: R745CNTL Based on: NEDPMANU Description Plant of manufacture

item.title: Field - nedseqn
item.description: Sequence number Map: R745CNTL Based on: NEDSEQN Description Sequence number

item.title: Field - nedtag
item.description: Tag Map: R745CNTL Based on: NEDTAG Description Tag

item.title: Field - nedtypen
item.description: Type number Map: R745CNTL Based on: NEDTYPEN Description Type number

item.title: Field - oil
item.description: Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds) Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74OIL Description Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds)

item.title: Field - os
item.description: OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Record: SMF74S5 Based on: flg Description OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field flg.

item.title: Field - pe2
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 2 Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Description Enhanced DAT facility 2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field prf.

item.title: Field - ped
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 1 Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Description Enhanced DAT facility 1 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prd
item.description: Product name Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74PRD Description Product name

item.title: Field - prf
item.description: Processor flags Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74PRF Description Processor flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description qes 0 System has expanded storage cne 1 Equipped with ESCON channel drc 2 ESCON Director in configuration eme 3 System in z/ARCH mode pri 4 At least one zAAP is currently installed prp 5 At least one zIIP is currently installed ped 6 Enhanced DAT facility 1 pe2 7 Enhanced DAT facility 2

item.title: Field - pri
item.description: At least one zAAP is currently installed Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Description At least one zAAP is currently installed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prl
item.description: LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF74PRL Description LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION

item.title: Field - prn
item.description: NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF74PRN Description NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS

item.title: Field - prp
item.description: At least one zIIP is currently installed Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Description At least one zIIP is currently installed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prs
item.description: OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF74PRS Description OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION

item.title: Field - ptn
item.description: PR/SM partition number Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74PTN Description PR/SM partition number

item.title: Field - qes
item.description: System has expanded storage Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Description System has expanded storage Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field prf.

item.title: Field - r7451aid
item.description: Device adapter ID. Only valid with RAID rank data Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451AID Description Device adapter ID. Only valid with RAID rank data

item.title: Field - r7451ct1
item.description: Bytes read (short float). Units in R7451UNT Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451CT1 Description Bytes read (short float). Units in R7451UNT

item.title: Field - r7451ct2
item.description: Bytes written (short float). Units in R7451UNT Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451CT2 Description Bytes written (short float). Units in R7451UNT

item.title: Field - r7451ct3
item.description: Read response time (short float). Units in R7451UNT Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451CT3 Description Read response time (short float). Units in R7451UNT

item.title: Field - r7451ct4
item.description: Write response time (short float). Units in R7451UNT Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451CT4 Description Write response time (short float). Units in R7451UNT

item.title: Field - r7451ct5
item.description: z/HPF Read I/O requests (short float) Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451CT5 Description z/HPF Read I/O requests (short float)

item.title: Field - r7451ct6
item.description: z/HPF Write I/O requests (short float) Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451CT6 Description z/HPF Write I/O requests (short float)

item.title: Field - r7451dvn
item.description: Device number (binary) Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451DVN Description Device number (binary)

item.title: Field - r7451flg
item.description: Information in this section: X'00’ = No additional data. X'01’ = RAID rank data. X'02’ = Physical storage data. Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451FLG Description Information in this section: X'00’ = No additional data. X'01’ = RAID rank data. X'02’ = Physical storage data.

item.title: Field - r7451gsf
item.description: Global Mirror Collisions (GMC) sidefile count (short float). A GMC occurs when, during the sending of data in the secondary to create a consistency group, a subsequent host update is attempted before the modified track has been transmitted to the secondary volume. The modified track will be moved to the sidefile before allowing a new host write. The counter will be incremented by one when a track is added to the sidefile.

item.title: Field - r7451gss
item.description: Global Mirror Collisions Send synchronous count (short float). When a write collision occurs, the modified track data which belongs to the current consistency group may be sent to the remote control unit before allowing the write. The data may come from the sidefile if it is full or from cache if the collision sidefile is not being utilized. Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451GSS Description Global Mirror Collisions Send synchronous count (short float).

item.title: Field - r7451hpf
item.description: zHPF read and write I/O requests available Map: R7451DEV Based on: r7451inc Description zHPF read and write I/O requests available Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r7451inc.

item.title: Field - r7451hss
item.description: HDD sector size. Only valid with RAID rank data Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451HSS Description HDD sector size. Only valid with RAID rank data

item.title: Field - r7451inc
item.description: Increment values Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451INC Description Increment values Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r7451sio 3 ‘1’ = Synchronous I/O cache data are valid r7451hpf 4 zHPF read and write I/O requests available

item.title: Field - r7451nvs
item.description: NVS space allocation (short float) Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451NVS Description NVS space allocation (short float)

item.title: Field - r7451rmr
item.description: Record mode read request (short float) Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451RMR Description Record mode read request (short float)

item.title: Field - r7451rsv
item.description: Lower interface I/O activity in msec (short float). Zero for 2107 Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451RSV Description Lower interface I/O activity in msec (short float). Zero for 2107

item.title: Field - r7451scs
item.description: Subchannel set ID Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451SCS Description Subchannel set ID

item.title: Field - r7451sio
item.description: ‘1’ = Synchronous I/O cache data are valid Map: R7451DEV Based on: r7451inc Description ‘1’ = Synchronous I/O cache data are valid Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r7451inc.

item.title: Field - r7451srh
item.description: Number of synchronous I/O cache read request hits. (Valid if bit 3 of R7451INC is set.) Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451SRH Description Number of synchronous I/O cache read request hits. (Valid if bit 3 of R7451INC is set.)

item.title: Field - r7451srr
item.description: Number of synchronous I/O cache read requests. (Valid if bit 3 of R7451INC is set.) Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451SRR Description Number of synchronous I/O cache read requests. (Valid if bit 3 of R7451INC is set.)

item.title: Field - r7451swh
item.description: Number of synchronous I/O cache write request hits. (Valid if bit 3 of R7451INC is set.) Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451SWH Description Number of synchronous I/O cache write request hits. (Valid if bit 3 of R7451INC is set.)

item.title: Field - r7451swr
item.description: Number of synchronous I/O cache write requests. (Valid if bit 3 of R7451INC is set.) Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451SWR Description Number of synchronous I/O cache write requests. (Valid if bit 3 of R7451INC is set.)

item.title: Field - r7451tsp
item.description: Number of tracks transferred to secondary PPRC volume (short float) Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451TSP Description Number of tracks transferred to secondary PPRC volume (short float)

item.title: Field - r7451unt
item.description: Units: ‘00’ = Bytes in units of 128K. Times in units of 16 milliseconds. ‘01’ = Reserved. ‘10’ = Reserved. ‘11’ = Reserved. Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451UNT Description Units: ‘00’ = Bytes in units of 128K. Times in units of 16 milliseconds. ‘01’ = Reserved. ‘10’ = Reserved. ‘11’ = Reserved. Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r7451xfl 7 ‘1’ = Transfer statistics R7451XFR valid

item.title: Field - r7451xcw
item.description: XRC or CC contaminated writes (short float) Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451XCW Description XRC or CC contaminated writes (short float)

item.title: Field - r7451xfl
item.description: ‘1’ = Transfer statistics R7451XFR valid Map: R7451DEV Based on: r7451unt Description ‘1’ = Transfer statistics R7451XFR valid Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r7451unt.

item.title: Field - r7451xsf
item.description: XRC or CC sidefile reads (short float) Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451XSF Description XRC or CC sidefile reads (short float)

item.title: Field - r7451zhh
item.description: zHPF List Pre-fetch I/O Request Hits. Number of command chains, where - the Transport Mode operation specified a non-zero Imbedded Locate Record Count. - the chain was completed without requiring access to any DDM. Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451ZHH Description zHPF List Pre-fetch I/O Request Hits. Number of command chains, where - the Transport Mode operation specified a non-zero Imbedded Locate Record Count. - the chain was completed without requiring access to any DDM.

item.title: Field - r7451zhl
item.description: zHPF List Pre-fetch I/O Requests. Number of command chains, where the Transport Mode operation specified a non-zero Imbedded Locate Record Count Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451ZHL Description zHPF List Pre-fetch I/O Requests. Number of command chains, where the Transport Mode operation specified a non-zero Imbedded Locate Record Count

item.title: Field - r7452dsh
item.description: Data sharing Map: R7451DEV Based on: r7452xfl Description Data sharing Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r7452xfl.

item.title: Field - r7452dxa
item.description: Dynamic extent allocation Map: R7451DEV Based on: r7452xfl Description Dynamic extent allocation Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r7452xfl.

item.title: Field - r7452mis
item.description: Migrating/migration state Map: R7451DEV Based on: r7452xfl Description Migrating/migration state Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r7452xfl.

item.title: Field - r7452pbr
item.description: Physical storage bytes read (short float). Units in R7451UNT Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7452PBR Description Physical storage bytes read (short float). Units in R7451UNT

item.title: Field - r7452pbw
item.description: Physical storage bytes written (short float). Units in R7451UNT Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7452PBW Description Physical storage bytes written (short float). Units in R7451UNT

item.title: Field - r7452pro
item.description: Physical storage read operations (short float) Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7452PRO Description Physical storage read operations (short float)

item.title: Field - r7452prt
item.description: Physical storage read response time (short float). Units in R7451UNT Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7452PRT Description Physical storage read response time (short float). Units in R7451UNT

item.title: Field - r7452pwo
item.description: Physical storage write operations (short float) Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7452PWO Description Physical storage write operations (short float)

item.title: Field - r7452pwt
item.description: Physical storage write response time (short float). Units in R7451UNT Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7452PWT Description Physical storage write response time (short float). Units in R7451UNT

item.title: Field - r7452xfl
item.description: Extent flags Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7452XFL Description Extent flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r7452dxa 0 Dynamic extent allocation r7452dsh 1 Data sharing r7452mis 2 Migrating/migration state

item.title: Field - r7452xid
item.description: Extent pool id Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7452XID Description Extent pool id

item.title: Field - r7452xty
item.description: Extent type: X'04’ = FB 1Gb. X'84’ = CKD 1Gb Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7452XTY Description Extent type: X'04’ = FB 1Gb. X'84’ = CKD 1Gb

item.title: Field - r745cae
item.description: ABEND CODE (SDWACMPC). System and User completion code (12 bits each) Map: R745CNTL Based on: R745CAE Description ABEND CODE (SDWACMPC). System and User completion code (12 bits each)

item.title: Field - r745ccnt
item.description: Record sequence number Map: R745CNTL Based on: R745CCNT Description Record sequence number

item.title: Field - r745cfdv
item.description: Failing device Map: R745CNTL Based on: R745CFDV Description Failing device

item.title: Field - r745cint
item.description: Number of seconds since subsystem statistics last collected Map: R745CNTL Based on: R745CINT Description Number of seconds since subsystem statistics last collected

item.title: Field - r745cioc
item.description: IOS return code. If not zero, no device data sections. SMF745DN = 0 Map: R745CNTL Based on: R745CIOC Description IOS return code. If not zero, no device data sections. SMF745DN = 0

item.title: Field - r745clvl
item.description: Gatherer level Map: R745CNTL Based on: R745CLVL Description Gatherer level

item.title: Field - r745cmdl
item.description: Caching subsystem model Map: R745CNTL Based on: R745CMDL Description Caching subsystem model

item.title: Field - r745crtn
item.description: IDCSS01 return code. If not zero, no device data sections. SMF745DN = 0 Map: R745CNTL Based on: R745CRTN Description IDCSS01 return code. If not zero, no device data sections. SMF745DN = 0

item.title: Field - r745csc
item.description: Status code 00 = successful processed, 04 = IOS return code R745CIOC ^= 0, 08 = IDCSS01 return code R745CRTN ^= 0, 98 = SYSTEM or USER ABEND R745CEA ^= 0 Map: R745CNTL Based on: R745CSC Description Status code 00 = successful processed, 04 = IOS return code R745CIOC ^= 0, 08 = IDCSS01 return code R745CRTN ^= 0, 98 = SYSTEM or USER ABEND R745CEA ^= 0

item.title: Field - r745cuid
item.description: Real CU type code. If R745CMDL=1, configured CU type code Map: R745CNTL Based on: R745CUID Description Real CU type code. If R745CMDL=1, configured CU type code

item.title: Field - r745dbcr
item.description: Bypass cache requests Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DBCR Description Bypass cache requests Floating point short

item.title: Field - r745dbdp
item.description: Device in a Soft Fenced state Map: R745DEV Based on: r745dcol Description Device in a Soft Fenced state Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r745dcol.

item.title: Field - r745dccu
item.description: Configured control unit type code if R745CMDL = 1 Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DCCU Description Configured control unit type code if R745CMDL = 1

item.title: Field - r745dcol
item.description: Volume Space Management B'00’ = Standard volume B'01’ = Track Space Efficient Volume B'10’ = Extent Space Efficient Volume B'11’ = Reserved Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DCOL Description Volume Space Management B'00’ = Standard volume B'01’ = Track Space Efficient Volume B'10’ = Extent Space Efficient Volume B'11’ = Reserved Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r745defn 2 Data exits in failed NVS r745dbdp 3 Device in a Soft Fenced state

item.title: Field - r745dcrh
item.description: Search read caching hits Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DCRH Description Search read caching hits Floating point short

item.title: Field - r745dcrm
item.description: Record cache read misses Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DCRM Description Record cache read misses Floating point short

item.title: Field - r745dctd
item.description: CACHE to DASD XFRs Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DCTD Description CACHE to DASD XFRs Floating point short

item.title: Field - r745dcwp
item.description: RCD cache write promotions Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DCWP Description RCD cache write promotions Floating point short

item.title: Field - r745defn
item.description: Data exits in failed NVS Map: R745DEV Based on: r745dcol Description Data exits in failed NVS Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r745dcol.

item.title: Field - r745dev4
item.description: B'1’ 4 digit device addr. Map: R745DEV Based on: r745dfl4 Description B'1’ 4 digit device addr. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r745dfl4.

item.title: Field - r745devn
item.description: Device number (binary) Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DEVN Description Device number (binary)

item.title: Field - r745dfl4
item.description: Flags Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DFL4 Description Flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r745dev4 0 B'1’ 4 digit device addr.

item.title: Field - r745dflg
item.description: Flags Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DFLG Description Flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r745dnav 0 Cache storage not available set to 0 for DS8000

item.title: Field - r745dfrm
item.description: Format of data returned B'0000’ = 3990 Models 1,2 and 3 or Basic Operation Mode B'0001’ = 3990 Model 6 Enhanced Operation Mode 1 or host supports DS8000 Disk Controller Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DFRM Description Format of data returned B'0000’ = 3990 Models 1,2 and 3 or Basic Operation Mode B'0001’ = 3990 Model 6 Enhanced Operation Mode 1 or host supports DS8000 Disk Controller

item.title: Field - r745dfwb
item.description: DASD Fast Write operations delayed due to non-volatile storage space constraints Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DFWB Description DASD Fast Write operations delayed due to non-volatile storage space constraints Floating point short

item.title: Field - r745dfwc
item.description: Fast write caching req. Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DFWC Description Fast write caching req. Floating point short

item.title: Field - r745dfwi
item.description: DFW inhibited Map: R745STAT Based on: r745svss Description DFW inhibited Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r745svss.

item.title: Field - r745dfwr
item.description: Operations delayed due to cache space constraints Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DFWR Description Operations delayed due to cache space constraints Floating point short

item.title: Field - r745dfws
item.description: Fast write sequ. req. Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DFWS Description Fast write sequ. req. Floating point short

item.title: Field - r745dicl
item.description: Inhibit cache load req. Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DICL Description Inhibit cache load req. Floating point short

item.title: Field - r745dkdh
item.description: CKD write hits, collected for 3990-03/06, 2105 Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DKDH Description CKD write hits, collected for 3990-03/06, 2105 Floating point short

item.title: Field - r745dkdw
item.description: CKD writes, collected for 3990-03/06, 2105 Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DKDW Description CKD writes, collected for 3990-03/06, 2105 Floating point short

item.title: Field - r745dnav
item.description: Cache storage not available set to 0 for DS8000 Map: R745DEV Based on: r745dflg Description Cache storage not available set to 0 for DS8000 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r745dflg.

item.title: Field - r745dnrh
item.description: Search read non-retentive request hits Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DNRH Description Search read non-retentive request hits Floating point short

item.title: Field - r745dntd
item.description: Normal cache requests DASD to CACHE XFRs Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DNTD Description Normal cache requests DASD to CACHE XFRs Floating point short

item.title: Field - r745dpdf
item.description: Format of Performance Data returned B'000’ = 3990 Format B'001’ = DS8000 Disk Controller Format Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DPDF Description Format of Performance Data returned B'000’ = 3990 Format B'001’ = DS8000 Disk Controller Format

item.title: Field - r745dpdt
item.description: If R745SFT = 1 or 2 Pinned data B'00’ = No pinned data B'01’ = Pinned data exists for the device B'10’ = Reserved B'11’ = Not used Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DPDT Description If R745SFT = 1 or 2 Pinned data B'00’ = No pinned data B'01’ = Pinned data exists for the device B'10’ = Reserved B'11’ = Not used

item.title: Field - r745drcr
item.description: Search read caching requ. Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DRCR Description Search read caching requ. Floating point short

item.description: Search read non-retentive requests Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DRNR Description Search read non-retentive requests Floating point short

item.title: Field - r745drsh
item.description: Read sequential requ.hits Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DRSH Description Read sequential requ.hits Floating point short

item.title: Field - r745drsr
item.description: Read sequential requests Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DRSR Description Read sequential requests Floating point short

item.title: Field - r745dscs
item.description: Subchannel set ID 00 - Subchannel set ID 0 01 - Subchannel set ID 1 10 - Subchannel set ID 2 11 - Subchannel set ID 3 Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DSCS Description Subchannel set ID 00 - Subchannel set ID 0 01 - Subchannel set ID 1 10 - Subchannel set ID 2 11 - Subchannel set ID 3

item.title: Field - r745dsdp
item.description: PPRC pair status B'00’ = PPRC pair available (full duplex) B'01’ = PPRC pair pending B'10’ = Not used B'11’ = Suspended Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DSDP Description PPRC pair status B'00’ = PPRC pair available (full duplex) B'01’ = PPRC pair pending B'10’ = Not used B'11’ = Suspended

item.title: Field - r745dsdv
item.description: Device caching status B'00’ = Caching activated Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DSDV Description Device caching status B'00’ = Caching activated

item.title: Field - r745dsfw
item.description: DASD fast write device status B'00’ = DFW allowed Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DSFW Description DASD fast write device status B'00’ = DFW allowed Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r745dspd 4 PPRC copy pair suspended r745dssd 5 PPRC copy pair is duplex pending

item.title: Field - r745dsg2
item.description: Device status group 2 …. 1… Device in a SPID Fenced state …. .1.. Volume is part of a RAID rank that is undergoing RAID rebuild Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DSG2 Description Device status group 2 …. 1… Device in a SPID Fenced state …. .1.. Volume is part of a RAID rank that is undergoing RAID rebuild

item.title: Field - r745dsid
item.description: Subsystem ID Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DSID Description Subsystem ID

item.title: Field - r745dspd
item.description: PPRC copy pair suspended Map: R745DEV Based on: r745dsfw Description PPRC copy pair suspended Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r745dsfw.

item.title: Field - r745dssd
item.description: PPRC copy pair is duplex pending Map: R745DEV Based on: r745dsfw Description PPRC copy pair is duplex pending Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r745dsfw.

item.title: Field - r745dtc
item.description: Seq DASD to cache XFRs Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DTC Description Seq DASD to cache XFRs Floating point short

item.title: Field - r745dunt
item.description: Unit addr. for sense CMD Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DUNT Description Unit addr. for sense CMD

item.title: Field - r745dvid
item.description: Device address Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DVID Description Device address

item.title: Field - r745dvol
item.description: Volume serial of device Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DVOL Description Volume serial of device

item.title: Field - r745dvs1
item.description: Addressed device status 1 Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DVS1 Description Addressed device status 1

item.title: Field - r745dvs2
item.description: Addressed device status 2 If R745SFT = 0 Pinned data (2 bits) 00.. …. No pinned data 01.. …. Pinned data exists for device 10.. …. Reserved 11.. …. Not used ..xx xx.. Not used …. ..1. Advanced FlashCopy enabled …. …1 FlashCopy volume enabled If R745SFT = 1 or 2 Global Mirror State (3 bits) 000. …. No Global Mirror configured 001. …. Global Mirror running optimal 010. …. Global Mirror running suboptimal 011.

item.title: Field - r745dwch
item.description: Write caching requ. hits Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DWCH Description Write caching requ. hits Floating point short

item.title: Field - r745dwnh
item.description: Write non-retentive hits Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DWNH Description Write non-retentive hits Floating point short

item.title: Field - r745dwnr
item.description: Write non-retentive requests Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DWNR Description Write non-retentive requests Floating point short

item.title: Field - r745dwrc
item.description: Write caching requests Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DWRC Description Write caching requests Floating point short

item.title: Field - r745dwsh
item.description: Write sequ. request hits Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DWSH Description Write sequ. request hits Floating point short

item.title: Field - r745dwsr
item.description: Write sequential requests Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DWSR Description Write sequential requests Floating point short

item.title: Field - r745savl
item.description: Available subsystem storage if R745SFT = 0 in bytes if R745SFT = 1 or 2 in KB Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SAVL Description Available subsystem storage if R745SFT = 0 in bytes if R745SFT = 1 or 2 in KB

item.title: Field - r745scln
item.description: Lng.of subsys. count area Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SCLN Description Lng.of subsys. count area

item.title: Field - r745scnf
item.description: Configured subsystem storage if R745SFT = 0 in bytes if R745SFT = 1 or 2 in KB Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SCNF Description Configured subsystem storage if R745SFT = 0 in bytes if R745SFT = 1 or 2 in KB

item.title: Field - r745scnv
item.description: Config. non-volatile cache, collected for if R745SFT = 0 in bytes if R745SFT = 1 or 2 in KB Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SCNV Description Config. non-volatile cache, collected for if R745SFT = 0 in bytes if R745SFT = 1 or 2 in KB

item.title: Field - r745scol
item.description: Colume Space Management B'00’ = Standard volume B'01’ = Track Space Efficient Volume B'10’ = Extent Space Efficient Volume B'11’ = Reserved Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SCOL Description Colume Space Management B'00’ = Standard volume B'01’ = Track Space Efficient Volume B'10’ = Extent Space Efficient Volume B'11’ = Reserved Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r745sfvs 2 Data on failed NVS r745sdbp 3 Device in a Soft Fenced state pending

item.title: Field - r745scs
item.description: Caching status …1 …. Reserved …. 1… Storage Facility running as a single cluster …. .1.. Must be zero …. ..1. Reserved Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SCS Description Caching status …1 …. Reserved …. 1… Storage Facility running as a single cluster …. .1.. Must be zero …. ..1. Reserved

item.title: Field - r745scsf
item.description: State of Copy Services Function Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SCSF Description State of Copy Services Function

item.title: Field - r745sdbp
item.description: Device in a Soft Fenced state pending Map: R745STAT Based on: r745scol Description Device in a Soft Fenced state pending Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r745scol.

item.title: Field - r745sdcs
item.description: Device caching status B'00’ = Caching activated Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SDCS Description Device caching status B'00’ = Caching activated

item.title: Field - r745sdev
item.description: Device number (binary) Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SDEV Description Device number (binary)

item.title: Field - r745sdfw
item.description: DASD fast write status B'00’ = DFW allowed Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SDFW Description DASD fast write status B'00’ = DFW allowed Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r745spdp 4 PPRC copy pair suspended r745ssdp 5 PPRC copy pair is duplex pending

item.title: Field - r745sdid
item.description: Device ID Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SDID Description Device ID

item.title: Field - r745sdpn
item.description: Pinned data (no longer used) Map: R745STAT Based on: r745sds2 Description Pinned data (no longer used) Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r745sds2.

item.title: Field - r745sdps
item.description: PPRC pair status B'00’ = PPRC pair available (full duplex) B'01’ = PPRC pair pending B'10’ = Not used B'11’ = Suspended Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SDPS Description PPRC pair status B'00’ = PPRC pair available (full duplex) B'01’ = PPRC pair pending B'10’ = Not used B'11’ = Suspended

item.title: Field - r745sds
item.description: Disabled for maintenance (No longer used) Map: R745STAT Based on: r745sos Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r745sos.

item.title: Field - r745sds1
item.description: Addressed device status 1 Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SDS1 Description Addressed device status 1

item.title: Field - r745sds2
item.description: Addressed device status 2 If R745SFT = 0 Pinned data (2 bits) 00.. …. No pinned data 01.. …. Pinned data exists for device 10.. …. Reserved 11.. …. Not used ..xx xx.. Not used …. ..1. Advanced FlashCopy enabled …. …1 FlashCopy volume enabled If R745SFT = 1 or 2 Global Mirror State (3 bits) 000. …. No Global Mirror configured 001. …. Global Mirror running optimal 010. …. Global Mirror running suboptimal 011.

item.title: Field - r745sfdp
item.description: Device is failed duplex (no longer used) Map: R745STAT Based on: r745sds2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r745sds2.

item.title: Field - r745sft
item.description: Status data format B’….0000’ = 40 bytes sense B’…….1’ = 44 bytes sense/ unit KB B’……10’ = 96 bytes sense/ unit KB Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SFT Description Status data format B’….0000’ = 40 bytes sense B’…….1’ = 44 bytes sense/ unit KB B’……10’ = 96 bytes sense/ unit KB

item.title: Field - r745sfvs
item.description: Data on failed NVS Map: R745STAT Based on: r745scol Description Data on failed NVS Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r745scol.

item.title: Field - r745sg2
item.description: Device status group 2 …. 1… Device in a SPID Fenced state …. .1.. Volume is part of a RAID rank that is undergoing RAID rebuild Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SG2 Description Device status group 2 …. 1… Device in a SPID Fenced state …. .1.. Volume is part of a RAID rank that is undergoing RAID rebuild

item.title: Field - r745sgl
item.description: Global status X'80’ CFW & DFW suspended Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SGL Description Global status X'80’ CFW & DFW suspended

item.title: Field - r745sim
item.description: IML device not available (no longer used) Map: R745STAT Based on: r745sos Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r745sos.

item.title: Field - r745sln
item.description: Length of data section Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SLN Description Length of data section

item.title: Field - r745snad
item.description: Num. of attached devices Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SNAD Description Num. of attached devices

item.title: Field - r745snds
item.description: Disabled for maintenance Map: R745STAT Based on: r745svss Description Disabled for maintenance Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r745svss.

item.title: Field - r745snht
item.description: Host termination Map: R745STAT Based on: r745svss Description Host termination Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r745svss.

item.title: Field - r745snis
item.description: Problem termination Map: R745STAT Based on: r745svss Description Problem termination Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r745svss.

item.title: Field - r745snpe
item.description: Pending due to problem Map: R745STAT Based on: r745svss Description Pending due to problem Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r745svss.

item.title: Field - r745snr
item.description: Non-retentive deactivated Map: R745STAT Based on: r745sos Description Non-retentive deactivated Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r745sos.

item.title: Field - r745snss
item.description: Num. of statistic sets Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SNSS Description Num. of statistic sets

item.title: Field - r745soff
item.description: Offline subsystem storage, collected for if R745SFT = 0 in bytes if R745SFT = 1 or 2 in KB Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SOFF Description Offline subsystem storage, collected for if R745SFT = 0 in bytes if R745SFT = 1 or 2 in KB

item.title: Field - r745sos
item.description: Overall caching status B'000’ = Caching active B'001’ = Reserved B'010’ = Subsystem error B'011’- B'111’ = Reserved Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SOS Description Overall caching status B'000’ = Caching active B'001’ = Reserved B'010’ = Subsystem error B'011’- B'111’ = Reserved Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r745snr 7 Non-retentive deactivated r745sds 3 Disabled for maintenance (No longer used) r745sim 6 IML device not available (no longer used)

item.title: Field - r745spda
item.description: If R745SFT = 1 or 2 Pinned data B'00’ = No pinned data B'01’ = Pinned data exists for the device B'10’ = Reserved B'11’ = Not used Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SPDA Description If R745SFT = 1 or 2 Pinned data B'00’ = No pinned data B'01’ = Pinned data exists for the device B'10’ = Reserved B'11’ = Not used

item.title: Field - r745spdp
item.description: PPRC copy pair suspended Map: R745STAT Based on: r745sdfw Description PPRC copy pair suspended Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r745sdfw.

item.title: Field - r745spin
item.description: Pinned subsystem storage,collected for if R745SFT = 0 in bytes if R745SFT = 1 or 2 in KB Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SPIN Description Pinned subsystem storage,collected for if R745SFT = 0 in bytes if R745SFT = 1 or 2 in KB

item.title: Field - r745spnd
item.description: Pinned non-volatile cache, collected for if R745SFT = 0 in bytes if R745SFT = 1 or 2 in KB Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SPND Description Pinned non-volatile cache, collected for if R745SFT = 0 in bytes if R745SFT = 1 or 2 in KB

item.title: Field - r745ssdp
item.description: PPRC copy pair is duplex pending Map: R745STAT Based on: r745sdfw Description PPRC copy pair is duplex pending Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r745sdfw.

item.title: Field - r745ssid
item.description: Subsystem Id Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SSID Description Subsystem Id

item.title: Field - r745sunt
item.description: Unit addr. for sense CMD Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SUNT Description Unit addr. for sense CMD

item.title: Field - r745svol
item.description: Volume serial of device Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SVOL Description Volume serial of device

item.title: Field - r745svss
item.description: Non-volatile storage stat. Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SVSS Description Non-volatile storage stat. Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r745snht 0 Host termination r745snis 1 Problem termination r745dfwi 2 DFW inhibited r745snds 3 Disabled for maintenance r745snpe 4 Pending due to problem

item.title: Field - ral
item.description: Length of reassembly area. Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74RAL Description Length of reassembly area. Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype

item.title: Field - ran
item.description: Number of reassembly area. This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken. If 1, record is broken. Offset and length are only valid if SMFxxRAN is 1. Reassembly area is only present in broken records. Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74RAN Description Number of reassembly area. This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken.

item.title: Field - rao
item.description: Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74RAO Description Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section

item.title: Field - rch
item.description: SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rcl
item.description: SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rrf
item.description: NEW RECORD FORMAT Record: SMF74S5 Based on: flg Description NEW RECORD FORMAT Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field flg.

item.title: Field - rty
item.description: RECORD TYPE Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF74RTY Description RECORD TYPE

item.title: Field - sam
item.description: Number of samples Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74SAM Description Number of samples

item.title: Field - seg
item.description: SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF74SEG Description SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR

item.title: Field - sid
item.description: SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF74SID Description SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION

item.title: Field - sl
item.description: Length of CACHE status data section Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF745SL Description Length of CACHE status data section

item.title: Field - sn
item.description: Number of CACHE status data sections Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF745SN Description Number of CACHE status data sections

item.title: Field - snm
item.description: System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74SNM Description System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME

item.title: Field - so
item.description: Offset to CACHE status data section Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF745SO Description Offset to CACHE status data section

item.title: Field - srl
item.description: SMF record level Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74SRL Description SMF record level

item.title: Field - ssi
item.description: SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF ) Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF74SSI Description SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF )

item.title: Field - sty
item.description: SUBTYPE Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF74STY Description SUBTYPE

item.title: Field - sut
item.description: SUBTYPES USED Record: SMF74S5 Based on: flg Description SUBTYPES USED Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field flg.

item.title: Field - syn
item.description: SYNC value in seconds Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74SYN Description SYNC value in seconds

item.title: Field - time
item.description: Time of Record Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF74TME

item.title: Field - timestamp
item.description: Record Timestamp Record: SMF74S5 Based on: date, time Description Timestamp from SMF data Post-Processed This field is combined from a date and a time field to form a timestamp.

item.title: Field - tme
item.description: TIME RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF74TME Description TIME RECORD WRITTEN

item.title: Field - trn
item.description: NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF74TRN Description NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC

item.title: Field - v4
item.description: MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Record: SMF74S5 Based on: flg Description MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field flg.

item.title: Field - vxa
item.description: MVS/XA IF ON Record: SMF74S5 Based on: flg Description MVS/XA IF ON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field flg.

item.title: Field - xl
item.description: Length of CACHE device data section extension Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF745XL Description Length of CACHE device data section extension

item.title: Field - xn
item.description: Number of CACHE device data section extensions Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF745XN Description Number of CACHE device data section extensions

item.title: Field - xnm
item.description: Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74XNM Description Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX

item.title: Field - xo
item.description: Offset to CACHE device data section extension Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF745XO Description Offset to CACHE device data section extension
